verses.verse: Now after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> it came<WH1961> to pass, that the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> Moses'<WH4872> minister,<WH8334> saying,<WH559>

Moses<WH4872> my servant<WH5650> is dead;<WH4191> now<WH6258> therefore arise,<WH6965> go<WH5674> over<WH5674> this Jordan,<WH3383> you, and all<WH3605> this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> to the land<WH776> which<WH834> I do give<WH5414> to them, even to the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
Every<WH3605> place<WH4725> that the sole<WH3709> of your foot<WH7272> shall tread<WH1869> on, that have I given<WH5414> to you, as I said<WH1696> to Moses.<WH4872>

From the wilderness<WH4057> and this<WH2088> Lebanon<WH3844> even to the great<WH1419> river,<WH5104> the river<WH5104> Euphrates,<WH6578> all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of the Hittites,<WH2850> and to the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> toward the going<WH3996> down<WH3996> of the sun,<WH8121> shall be your coast.<WH1366>

There shall not any man<WH376> be able<WH3320> to stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> you all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of your life:<WH2416> as I was with Moses,<WH4872> so I will be with you: I will not fail<WH7503> you, nor<WH3808> forsake<WH5800> you.

Be strong<WH2388> and of a good courage:<WH553> for to this<WH2088> people<WH5971> shall you divide for an inheritance<WH5157> the land,<WH776> which<WH834> I swore<WH7650> to their fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> them.

Only<WH7535> be you strong<WH2388> and very<WH3966> courageous,<WH553> that you may observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> the law,<WH8451> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> my servant<WH5650> commanded<WH6680> you: turn<WH5493> not from it to the right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> or to the left,<WH8040> that you may prosper<WH7919> wherever<WH3605> <WH834> you go.<WH3212>

This<WH2088> book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451> shall not depart<WH4185> out of your mouth;<WH6310> but you shall meditate<WH1897> therein day<WH3119> and night,<WH3915> that you may observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that is written<WH3789> therein: for then<WH227> you shall make your way<WH1870> prosperous,<WH6743> and then<WH227> you shall have good success.<WH7919>

Have not I commanded<WH6680> you? Be strong<WH2388> and of a good courage;<WH553> be not afraid,<WH6206> neither<WH408> be you dismayed:<WH2865> for the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> is with you wherever<WH3605> <WH834> you go.<WH3212>
Then Joshua<WH3091> commanded<WH6680> the officers<WH7860> of the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559>

Pass<WH5674> through<WH7130> the host,<WH4264> and command<WH6680> the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> Prepare<WH3559> you victuals;<WH6720> for within<WH5750> three<WH7969> days<WH3117> you shall pass<WH5674> over<WH5674> this<WH2088> Jordan,<WH3383> to go<WH935> in to possess<WH3423> the land,<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you to possess<WH3423> it.
And to the Reubenites,<WH7206> and to the Gadites,<WH1425> and to half<WH2677> the tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh,<WH4519> spoke<WH559> Joshua,<WH3091> saying,<WH559>

Remember<WH2142> the word<WH1697> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> you, saying,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given you rest,<WH5117> and has given<WH5414> you this<WH2063> land.<WH776>

Your wives,<WH802> your little<WH2945> ones, and your cattle,<WH4735> shall remain<WH3427> in the land<WH776> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> you on this side<WH5676> Jordan;<WH3383> but you shall pass<WH5674> before<WH6440> your brothers<WH251> armed,<WH2571> all<WH3605> the mighty<WH1368> men of valor,<WH2428> and help<WH5826> them;

Until<WH5704> the LORD<WH3068> have given your brothers<WH251> rest,<WH5117> as he has given you, and they also<WH1571> have possessed<WH3423> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> them: then you shall return<WH7725> to the land<WH776> of your possession,<WH3425> and enjoy<WH3423> it, which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the LORD's<WH3068> servant<WH5650> gave<WH5414> you on this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> toward the sun rise.<WH4217> <WH8121>
And they answered<WH6030> Joshua,<WH3091> saying,<WH559> All<WH3605> that you command<WH6680> us we will do,<WH6213> and wherever<WH413> you send<WH7971> us, we will go.<WH3212>

According as we listened<WH8085> to Moses<WH4872> in all<WH3605> things, so<WH3651> will we listen<WH8085> to you: only<WH7535> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> be with you, as he was with Moses.<WH4872>

Whoever<WH376> <WH834> he be that does rebel<WH4784> against your commandment,<WH6310> and will not listen<WH8085> to your words<WH1697> in all<WH3605> that you command<WH6680> him, he shall be put to death:<WH4191> only<WH7535> be strong<WH2388> and of a good courage.<WH553>
